title: Banks Ready $38 Billion of Debt for Oracle-Tied Data Centers
description: JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc. are leading a roughly $38 billion debt package to fund data centers connected to Oracle Corp. in Wisconsin and Texas, according to people familiar with the matter.

title: Broadcom CEO Promises Big Improvement for AI Outlook in 2026
description: Broadcom Inc. Chief Executive Officer Hock Tan told investors that the chipmaker’s artificial intelligence outlook will improve “significantly” in fiscal 2026, helping allay concerns about slowing growth.

title: Salesforce, Figma Decline After Earnings | Bloomberg Tech 9/4/2025
description: Bloomberg’s Caroline Hyde and Ed Ludlow discuss the sell-off of Salesforce shares following a lackluster topline growth forecast that suggests AI isn't paying off just yet. Plus Apple plans to launch an AI-powered web search tool for Siri to rival OpenAI. And HPE CEO Antonio Neri discusses the company’s earnings, Juniper Networks acquisition and partnership with Nvidia.  (Source: Bloomberg)
